title: Insomnia
description: A human that can't fall asleep

stages.title: I can’t fall asleep for so long ... Maybe this medicine will help me?
You dreamed that you were Alice in Wonderland. A rabbit without pants with hints of a sexual nature runs to you
You even didn't notice how a rabbit did it, but now you're one of a lot of his victims
